head.supplied: Melbourne bot. Garden ¶ 28/8/64 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to bring under your notice, that the footpath of the domain-Street (South-Yarra), especially on that part opposite Millswyn-Street, is at pr...

div.p: No. 662, unit 823, VPRS 3181/P Town Clerk's file series 1, VA 511 Melbourne, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I have the honor to bring under your notice, that the footpath of the domain-Street (South-Yarra), especially on that part opposite Millswyn-Street, is at present in an impassable state, in consequence of the water from Punt-hill becoming stagnant at the spot indicated. It would merely need the deepening of the channel to allow the water to flow off and this could be effected by a very inconsiderable outlay. I thought it proper to bring this circumstance, which causes much inconvenience to the inhabitants of South-Yarra under your favorable consideration, in as much as the ground under my control is closely adjacent to the innundated locality.

div.p: I have the honor to be,
